attributes.review: When I tried to open this app it came up with an orange screen and wouldn’t close. I had to HARD RESET my phone FOUR TIMES. This app is trash and I don’t even know why it’s still on this app store. 🤦🏼‍♀️Just take it off already it doesn’t work.
attributes.title: Hate this app

attributes.review: this app is ABSOLUTELY HORRIBLE!!! i am FURIOUS with this cheeto and i cant believe that this app STILL exists!! this needs to be taken down NOW!!! poopy trump is sexist, racist, homophobic, and just overall awful. we need him out of office, for the safety of everyone, especially women, people in the lgbt+ community, minorities, and many more
attributes.title: this is the WORST

attributes.review: This app is absolutely TERRIBLE, I could never find my way around the app. Not to mention it looks disgusting, like who designs these? It also takes up way to much storage in my phone and it started to make my other apps lag. Please do not get this app✨✨✨✨
attributes.title: DO NOT GET THIS APP

attributes.review: so i downloaded this app because my dead grandma told me how amazing it is but when i opened it i got facetimed by the joke of a president Trump and he told me to kill myself😔😡💅🏼 no this is not a joke and yes i did end up doing it 🔥👄💩 this app was awful and I would not recommend it to anybody... rip to me😚🤚🏼✨😌
attributes.title: SO ANGRY 😡✨💢⭕️

attributes.review: This app took wayyyy too long to download but I had my WiFi on and all my other networks were working just fine. They also asked for information I shouldn’t give to anyone. 0/10 do not recommend 👎
attributes.title: Terrible

attributes.review: I tried to download it to keep up with the events and it just crashes. it isn’t my internet or anything. the app is just crappy. instead of trying to ban tiktok and not trying to get your country back up on its feet , maybe fix your app 😘
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: As soon as I downloaded it my phone crashed. Endless campaign ads with some man named Donald Trump, frankly forgot who he is, keeps popping up on my screen, he is very orange and the pigmentation hurts my eyes. Endless viruses in my software now, shall I say corona in a screen, DO NOT DOWNLOAD for the safety of your phone and wellbeing. ✨🧚🏽‍♀️
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: This app took weeks to download and when it did finally download it wouldn’t start up and it kept kicking me out! I have had it with this app and I want others to hear this before wasting their time on this app😤🙄!
attributes.title: Worst app ever.

attributes.review: This app my phone glitch so bad to the point I could not exit or enter any other app. At one point it turned my whole screen orange for no reason. I don’t recommend downloading this app unless you want a virus than go ahead.
attributes.title: Don’t download

attributes.review: i am so appalled by this app. Had great hope but of course i was left for dead like the 3,000+ missing children in ICE detention centers. the second i opened this app i immediately developed a fever and chills and became a very congested. After getting tested i have corona and the doctor told me it was this app! RUDE!
attributes.title: this app STOLE my info and gave me COVID-19
